parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description:
The supported natural language. Valid values:

*   **zh-CN**: Chinese
*   **en-US** (default): English
*   **ja**: Japanese

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description:
The client token used to ensure the idempotence of the request.

You can use the client to generate this value. Ensure that the value is unique among all requests. Only ASCII characters are allowed.

>  If you do not specify this parameter, the value of **RequestId** is used.**** **RequestId** of each request is different.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region to which the zone belongs. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~443657~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ServiceCode
parameters.description: The service code. Set the value to **nlb**.
